quotes.quote: It has been my experience that folks who have no vices have very few virtues.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Search others for their virtues, thyself for thy vices.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It is a great thing to know our vices.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: The problem with people who have no vices is that generally you can be pretty sure they're going to have some pretty annoying virtues.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: Hate no one; hate their vices, not themselves.
quotes.author: J. G. C. Brainard

quotes.quote: The greatest minds are capable of the greatest vices as well as of the greatest virtues.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: Nothing is as certain as that the vices of leisure are gotten rid of by being busy.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: He has all the virtues I dislike and none of the vices I admire.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Here's a rule I recommend: Never practice two vices at once.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: It is good to be without vices, but it is not good to be without temptations.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: The better part of valour is discretion.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote:
The gods are just, and of our pleasant vices
Make instruments to plague us.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare
